Row.Text: Cities +1 Loyalty, full Loyalty cities provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Shrines and Temples provide [ICON_Science] Science equal to their intrinsic [ICON_Faith] Faith output.
Cities with that religion as their dominant religion gain a believer's faith bonus from each religion (with at least one follower) in the city.

Receives Follower Belief bonuses in a city from each Religion that has at least 1 Follower. Cities gain an [ICON_Amenities] Amenity for every Religion with at least 1 Follower. Missionaries have +2 spreads. +100% Religious pressure from your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes, +5 loyalty for cities practicing mainstream religions.

Replace.Text: 城市+1忠诚度，满忠诚度的城市提供+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值与 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。
神社和寺庙提供等同于其固定产出的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值的 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
信奉该宗教的城市 +2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
信奉该宗教的城市，从城市中的每种宗教（至少有一个信徒）获得信徒信仰加成。
从城市中的每个宗教（其须拥有至少1个信徒）获得信徒信仰加成。城市从每个宗教（须有至少1个信徒）获得1点 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。传教士的传播次数+2。来自 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线的宗教压力+100%，信奉主流宗教的城市+5忠诚度。
